Overwhelming demand from ETPs and Corporate Treasuries.‚Äù Hougan noted that this marks the start of what he identified as a ‚Äúclassic demand shock,‚Äù adding that spot Ethereum ETPs accounted for over $5 billion of these purchases. The Bitwise executive added that he expects demand to increase even further, noting that ETH ETPs have bought less than 12% of the assets that Bitcoin ETPs have bought. ETH ETFs surge in net flow is a major contributor to ETH performance (Source: Matt Hougan) The CIO projects an additional $20 billion in institutional purchases over the next 12 months. This would equate to 5.33 million ETH entering long-term holdings at current market prices. Meanwhile, Ethereum‚Äôs projected issuance over the same period is expected to be only 800,000 ETH, suggesting a potential 7-to-1 demand-to-supply ratio. However, he acknowledged that ETH is not the same as Bitcoin, that the price is not driven primarily by demand and supply, and that it does not share ‚ÄòBitcoin capped long term issuance‚Äô. Still, he noted that ETH will go higher for now as there is more demand for ETH than supply. Meanwhile, Hougan added that growing momentum around stablecoins and tokenized assets will likely drive further ETH demand. He noted that as traditional assets such as stocks and fiat move onto Ethereum‚Äôs programmable ledger, it strengthens the narrative of ETH as essential infrastructure. Ethereum rebounding after early setback Meanwhile, Ethereum is rapidly regaining momentum. In the post, Matt‚ÄØHougan highlighted that ETH has surged more than 65‚ÄØ% over the past month and 160‚ÄØ% since April, marking a strong rebound from early‚Äëyear weakness. With the gains, ETH is back in the green with 7.63% yearly gains. Although the asset is down 2% in the past 24 hours, it has reached its weekly peak of $3,800. However, many believe the price correction that has sent its price careening back to $3,600 is only a minor correction after the recent surge. According to crypto analyst Dan Crypto, Ethereum is not overheated yet, and any correction in price will be minimal because its current rally compares to previous rallies in March 2024 and November 2024. He said: ‚ÄúLooking at a slightly bigger frame, compared to the overheating in the futures market in March 2024 and November 2024, the current level is way too small. Even if a correction comes, it‚Äôs likely to be shallow and short.‚Äù The analyst further observed that the current Ethereum cycle has been sluggish despite being in an upcycle. He acknowledged that ETH has already reached what seems to be a bottom in this cycle. Therefore, the only way for ETH is for the price to go up. Analysts warn of upcoming volatility Meanwhile, the resurgence in ETH value has led to increasing sentiments about the incoming altcoin season within the crypto community. With several chatters on X (formerly Twitter) about the altcoins season, analysts have warned about potential market volatility. According to Santiment analysts, crypto users should be prepared for volatility in the recent trends, adding that prices tend to increase mostly when the crowd does not expect it. The firm wrote: ‚ÄúWhen the crowd begins to perpetuate that we are in ‚Äúaltseason‚Äù, beware of some upcoming volatility. Crypto prices historically move up most prominently during periods of crowd disbelief.‚Äù Interestingly, Ethereum‚Äôs recent performance came amidst crowd sentiment that ‚Äúit is over.‚Äù Santiment noted that markets usually move in the opposite direction from retail expectations. HEADLINE: Bitcoin (BTC) Consolidates as Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Wins Over Whale Investors
SUMMARY: Bitcoin (BTC) remains stable in consolidation, whereas real-world market ripple effects are created by Mutuum Finance (MUTM) , which currently draws heavyweight whale investors. Mutuum Finance price is $0.03 in 5th presale stage, with more than 85% sold out. Phase 5 investors will enjoy 100% return on investment when token lists. More than $12.9 million has been raised and there are more than 13,900 early investors. The token price of presale Phase 6 will be increased to $0.035, and that‚Äôs a 16.67% return on investment at Phase 5. Mutuum Finance is already among the top-watched altcoins in the market in 2025. Bitcoin Consolidates After All-Time Highs Bitcoin (BTC) at $118,000 is experiencing consolidation after the cryptocurrency reached close to its present all-time high of $123,000 last week. The cryptocurrency has remained in a range of $116,000 to $123,000 and the speculators have been holding out for a breakout sign. Robust ETF inflows and continued levels of support are presented by analysts as the cause of the slowdown, with the focus now shifting to whether BTC can penetrate $125,000 in subsequent weeks. This phase of consolidation follows as the demand of the investors also increases for upcoming projects like MUTM. Strong Investor Demand Drives Mutuum Presale Over $12.9M Mutuum Finance presale has already attracted more than 13900 investors and is already over the $12.9 million mark. More than 85% of the tokens in phase 5 have been bought by investors. This indicates greater confidence of the investors in the success of the project in the near future as well as its better future. Mutuum Empowers DeFi Security with CertiK-Supported Bug Bounty As its second move towards security and openness, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) has also started an Official Bug Bounty Program with CertiK. The project will be rewarding the amount of $50,000 USDT to participants who find likely bugs in the program. The role of bounty program is to provide fair coverage for all the classes of vulnerabilities. It is divided into four severity classes; i.e., critical, major, minor, and low. Mutuum Finance Launches Huge Token Giveaway Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is even organizing a $100,000 giveaway where the users will be awarded the prize pool and will receive MUTM tokens, each worth $10,000. The top 50 holders of Mutuum Finance will also be rewarded by its new leaderboard system. Bonus tokens will be awarded when the users level up. Mutuum Finance: A New Model of DeFi Lending Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is redefining lending in DeFi by creating a platform offering full asset ownership to customers. It‚Äôs an ongoing multi-purpose double-lending platform created through the combination of Peer-to-Contract (P2C) and Peer-to-Peer (P2P) model. Smart contracts are used for P2C lending pool access. The system responds based on the prevailing market condition, which is something that is mitigating lenders‚Äô revenue volatility and the economic instability of the borrower. By removing the middlemen, the P2P model is assuming the cost of direct lending, which is convenient for highly volatile assets like meme coins. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is rapidly closing in on the whale investors, with $12.9M raised, 13,900+ holders, and Phase 5 already 85% sold out at $0.03. The presale price rises to $0.035 in Phase 6, giving early investors a direct 16.67% profit, and a 100% ROI in wait for listing at $0.06. With basing Bitcoin, whales are quietly building up MUTM as the next giant DeFi play. Lock up your tokens now before Phase 5 sells out. HEADLINE: MARA Holdings Announces $850M Offering to Buy Bitcoin
SUMMARY: MARA Holdings, Inc., a leading Bitcoin (BTC) mining company, has announced that it plans to offer $850 million principal amount of 0.00% convertible senior notes due in 2032. This move aims to strengthen the company‚Äôs financial position and support its long-term growth. According to the press release , the offering will be available only to qualified institutional investors, as defined by Rule 144A of the Securities Act of 1933. MARA Holdings Convertible Notes Offering Convertible senior notes represent a form of debt security that offers investors the option to convert their holdings into equity at a future date, while also accruing interest. For MARA, these convertible senior notes will not earn interest (other than special interest in limited circumstances), unless they are converted, repurchased, or redeemed earlier. The special interest on the notes, if any, will be paid semi-annually in arrears on February 1 and August 1 each year, starting from February 2026. Notably, this zero-coupon structure enables MARA Holdings to raise capital without incurring immediate cash interest payments, thereby providing them with greater flexibility to manage their operational cash flow. Investors have the flexibility to either hold these senior, unsecured notes until they mature or convert them into shares of MARA Holdings. Additionally, the company will offer the initial buyers a 13-day option, starting from the issue date, to purchase up to an additional $150 million. MARA Holdings Strategic Financial Maneuvering MARA plans to use up to $50 million from the sale of the notes to repurchase some of its existing 1.00% convertible senior notes, which are due in 2026. The remaining funds from this offering will likely be used to purchase additional Bitcoin and for general business purposes. This may include paying off more debt, improving operations, or making strategic investments in blockchain technology and AI-driven solutions. Recall that the company reported a noticeable drop in Bitcoin production for June 2025 . Despite the dip, MARA remains focused on its long-term strategy. It plans to keep expanding its mining capacity and energy infrastructure as part of its broader goal to lead in the fast-growing Bitcoin mining industry. Similarly, the company is aiming high, with plans to reach a hash rate of 75 EH/s by the end of 2025. ‚ÄúInvest-and-Forget‚Äù Approach for Bitcoin Earlier in the year, Fred Thiel, CEO of MARA Holdings, suggested a straightforward strategy for retail investors: invest in BTC regularly and let it be. In his words, ‚ÄúMy recommendation to my kids, for example, is to put a little aside every month in BTC and let it grow over time.‚Äù He emphasized that over two ot four years, this method can yield significant returns, noting Bitcoin‚Äôs average annual growth of 29% to over 50%. Thiel acknowledges the volatility inherent in Bitcoin compared to traditional financial assets. He remained confident in the cryptocurrency‚Äôs potential to outperform over extended periods. It is worth noting that MARA Holdings mirrors its CEO‚Äôs bullish stance on Bitcoin . The post MARA Holdings Announces $850M Offering to Buy Bitcoin appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

HEADLINE: PNC Bank CEO Says Company Will Provide Crypto Wallet for ‚ÄôAny Coin‚Äô That Clients Want To Use
SUMMARY: The chief executive of financial services giant PNC Bank says that the firm is considering providing crypto wallet services following the announcement of its partnership with Coinbase. In a new interview on CNBC Television, PNC CEO Bill Demchak says that the company‚Äôs partnership with Coinbase ‚Äì which started years ago but advanced earlier this week ‚Äì will finally be able to flourish due to a friendlier economic and regulatory landscape. ‚ÄúWe actually went down the path with Coinbase several years ago to do something similar. And we‚Äôre enabling US digital payments through Coinbase on our systems. We‚Äôre also using our bank capabilities for fiat, our treasury management services for them. So we‚Äôre doing two things at once. But we looked at this a bunch of years ago. And then we kind of had the crypto winter. And we had prohibitions from regulators to, you know, even spell crypto. And everything went on hold. Now we‚Äôve got the Genius Act through and there‚Äôs progress and regulators back and forth have dropped their restrictions on our ability to work with crypto. So off we go.‚Äù According to Demchak, PNC will not be creating its own stablecoin; rather, it will look at serving as a wallet for any token its clients would want to use. ‚ÄúCoinbase is our backbone. If there is an industry-led stablecoin, it could be traded in that wallet or any of the other ones. So we‚Äôre not making a decision. We‚Äôre not going to produce a stablecoin per se, certainly not in our own name, but we‚Äôll be a wallet, a provider for any coin that any of our clients want to use.‚Äù Follow us on X , Facebook and Telegram Don''t Miss a Beat ‚Äì Subscribe to get email alerts delivered directly to your inbox Check Price Action Surf The Daily Hodl Mix Disclaimer: Opinions expressed at The Daily Hodl are not investment advice. Investors should do their due diligence before making any high-risk investments in Bitcoin, cryptocurrency or digital assets. HEADLINE: Crucial Russia Ukraine Peace Talks Conclude: What It Means for Global Markets & Crypto
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Crucial Russia Ukraine Peace Talks Conclude: What It Means for Global Markets & Crypto In an increasingly interconnected world, geopolitical shifts often send immediate tremors through global financial markets. For those navigating the dynamic landscape of cryptocurrency, understanding these broader movements is not just advisable, but essential. A significant development recently emerged with the conclusion of the Russia Ukraine peace talks in Istanbul, a pivotal moment that, while brief in its initial reporting, carries profound implications for stability and investor sentiment. As reported by Walter Bloomberg on X, citing Russian news agency TASS, these high-stakes discussions have wrapped up, leaving market participants to ponder the next steps and their potential impact on everything from traditional stocks to digital assets. The Significance of Russia Ukraine Peace Talks: A Glimpse into Geopolitical Chess The conflict between Russia and Ukraine has undeniably been one of the most impactful geopolitical events of recent times, triggering widespread humanitarian concerns, energy crises, and significant economic disruptions. Against this backdrop, any dialogue aimed at de-escalation, no matter how preliminary, captures immediate global attention. The Russia Ukraine peace talks in Istanbul represented a flicker of hope, a potential pathway towards resolving a conflict that has cast a long shadow over international relations and global economies. Humanitarian Imperative: The primary goal of any peace talks is to alleviate suffering and protect civilian lives. Economic Stability: A resolution could stabilize commodity prices, ease supply chain pressures, and foster economic recovery. Geopolitical Realignments: The outcome could reshape alliances and power dynamics on the global stage. Investor Confidence: Reduced uncertainty often translates to increased investor confidence across all asset classes. These talks, even if not immediately yielding a full resolution, are crucial for gauging the willingness of both sides to engage diplomatically. Their conclusion, as reported, marks a specific point in time, signaling either a pause, a deadlock, or perhaps, a quiet continuation behind the scenes. Understanding the Istanbul Discussions: Key Players and Reported Outcomes While the initial report from TASS via Walter Bloomberg on X was concise, the very fact that Russia Ukraine peace talks took place in Istanbul indicates a concerted effort to find common ground. Details surrounding such sensitive negotiations are often scarce, but the presence of high-level delegations suggests serious intent. Although specific outcomes were not immediately detailed in the initial reports, these discussions typically revolve around core issues central to the conflict. Key Aspects of the Istanbul Peace Talks: Aspect Details Reported / Implied Participants High-level delegations from both Russia and Ukraine. Venue Istanbul, Turkey (a neutral ground facilitated by Turkish mediation efforts). Reported Agenda (Common) Ceasefire, humanitarian corridors, security guarantees, territorial status, neutrality status. Initial Outcome Talks concluded; specific breakthroughs or failures not immediately detailed in initial reports. Source of Information Russian news agency TASS, reported by Walter Bloomberg on X. The lack of immediate, extensive public statements following the conclusion of the Russia Ukraine peace talks can be interpreted in multiple ways: either the discussions were highly sensitive and require further internal review, or they did not yield definitive public agreements at that precise moment. Nevertheless, the act of meeting itself is a significant development in the ongoing geopolitical narrative. How Russia Ukraine Peace Talks Ripple Through Global Markets The conclusion of the Russia Ukraine peace talks immediately put global financial markets on alert. Geopolitical stability is a cornerstone of economic confidence, and any perceived shift ‚Äì positive or negative ‚Äì can trigger significant market movements. Investors constantly weigh risk and reward, and major international conflicts introduce a layer of uncertainty that can deter investment and encourage capital flight to safer assets. Equity Markets: Stock markets often react to news of peace talks with optimism, as reduced geopolitical risk can boost corporate earnings forecasts and consumer confidence. Conversely, a perceived failure could lead to sell-offs. Commodity Prices: Energy prices (oil, natural gas) are particularly sensitive to the conflict, given Russia‚Äôs role as a major producer. Food prices are also affected due to disruptions in agricultural exports from the region. Peace talks can lead to price fluctuations as traders anticipate changes in supply. Safe-Haven Assets: Gold, the U.S. Dollar, and certain government bonds typically see increased demand during times of uncertainty. News from peace talks can cause these assets to fluctuate as risk app

Equity Markets: Stock markets often react to news of peace talks with optimism, as reduced geopolitical risk can boost corporate earnings forecasts and consumer confidence. Conversely, a perceived failure could lead to sell-offs. Commodity Prices: Energy prices (oil, natural gas) are particularly sensitive to the conflict, given Russia‚Äôs role as a major producer. Food prices are also affected due to disruptions in agricultural exports from the region. Peace talks can lead to price fluctuations as traders anticipate changes in supply. Safe-Haven Assets: Gold, the U.S. Dollar, and certain government bonds typically see increased demand during times of uncertainty. News from peace talks can cause these assets to fluctuate as risk app

HEADLINE: Former TD Bank Employee Now Barred From Industry After Using Confidential Customer Info To Steal $41,500: OCC
SUMMARY: A US banking regulator has barred a former TD Bank employee from the industry after alleging she stole $41,500 via unauthorized customer withdrawals. Last week, the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) published an order of prohibition against Lacey Ann Henry, who was employed as a teller manager at the Trooper, Pennsylvania, branch of TD Bank from June 2020 to February 2022. The regulator says Henry accessed confidential customer information to make the unauthorized cash withdrawals from checking accounts in late 2021. Explains the OCC, ‚ÄúBy reason of the foregoing conduct, [the] respondent engaged in violations of law and unsafe and unsound practices, which resulted in financial loss to the Bank and financial gain to [the] respondent, and demonstrated personal dishonesty.‚Äù The prohibition bars Henry from participating in the affairs of insured depository institutions, institutions treated as insured banks, insured credit unions, institutions chartered under the Farm Credit Act of 1971, the Federal Housing Finance Agency, any Federal Home Loan Bank and any relevant federal regulatory agency. Henry consented to the order but did not admit or deny the OCC‚Äôs findings. The order of prohibition does not preclude other government agencies, including the Department of Justice (DOJ), from bringing additional actions against her. HEADLINE: One of the Largest Banks in the US Announces Its Move into Cryptocurrency
SUMMARY: PNC Bank, one of America''s leading financial institutions, is preparing to offer cryptocurrency buying, selling and custody services to its customers by collaborating with cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase. In a joint statement on Tuesday, it was stated that PNC will build its own crypto transaction infrastructure using Coinbase''s enterprise ‚Äúcrypto-as-a-service‚Äù (CaaS) platform. The Pittsburgh-based bank will allow its customers to buy, sell, and securely store Bitcoin and other digital assets. PNC will also provide certain banking services to Coinbase, further enhancing their mutual partnership. Related News: Huge Ethereum (ETH) Withdrawals Are Taking Place - CEO Reveals the Identity of the Whale Behind Them This strategic partnership between PNC and Coinbase is seen as a significant shift in the traditional banking sector''s historical distance from cryptocurrencies. Cryptocurrency companies have previously accused the banking sector of being ‚Äúhostile‚Äù towards them. Earlier this year, allegations surfaced in Congressional hearings that banks were deliberately avoiding providing services to certain sectors. While lawmakers from both parties agreed on this, differing views were expressed on the root cause of the problem. The banking industry, however, denied these accusations, arguing that outdated and complex regulations were the reason for their inability to provide service. The announcement of the PNC-Coinbase partnership comes as US President Donald Trump''s cryptocurrency-friendly policies are gaining traction. Last week, Trump signed legislation establishing a dedicated regulatory framework for stablecoins, a long-awaited step in the industry. Other major banks, including Bank of America and Citibank, have also announced plans to launch their own stablecoins. ‚ÄúOur partnership with Coinbase allows us to deliver innovative crypto financial solutions to our customers faster,‚Äù PNC CEO William Demchak said in a statement. ‚ÄúThrough this partnership, we will be able to meet the growing demand for secure and easy access to digital assets on PNC‚Äôs trusted platform.‚Äù *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: One of the Largest Banks in the US Announces Its Move into Cryptocurrency

HEADLINE: Analyst: Next Is $7 Once XRP Clears This Rigid Hurdle
SUMMARY: XRP is once again in the spotlight as analysts turn attention to a critical price level that could define its next major move. After staging a strong recovery in 2025 and recently surpassing its previous all-time high, a r ecent flash crash has sent its price to $3.20 region. According to chart analyst XRPunkie on X, the digital asset is consolidating just beneath a long-term resistance trendline, one that has historically served as a major obstacle for upward momentum. XRP Stalls Below a Key Technical Barrier The chart the analyst shared before the flash crash shows XRP trading at around $3.47, just shy of a major diagonal resistance that forms the upper boundary of an ascending channel dating back to 2017. This trendline, marked by a yellow arrow in the chart, is acting as a ceiling, similar to how the $3.50 zone capped XRP‚Äôs explosive rally during the 2017‚Äì2018 bull run. Despite multiple attempts, the price has yet to close decisively above this level, suggesting the presence of significant selling pressure. Interestingly $XRP met with some resistance at the $3.50 range for a while. Looking at this chart, apparently its hanging just below the first resistance trendline (yellow arrow). Once we clear it, the next resistance is around $7-$9 (blue arrow). Is XRP gonna to get there soon? https://t.co/chGGhwWC8X pic.twitter.com/ZyqfSADm6t ‚Äî XRPunkie (@Shawnmark7899) July 23, 2025 What makes this area even more crucial is its psychological significance. The $3.50 level represents a long-standing benchmark in XRP‚Äôs history. Its inability to break above this range decisively during previous cycles signals that bulls must muster greater strength before a larger move can unfold. Breakout Could Ignite Rally Toward $7‚Äì$9 XRPunkie‚Äôs analysis suggests that once this resistance is cleared, the next major target lies in the $7 to $9 range . The chart highlights this zone with a blue arrow, aligned with the Fibonacci 1.272 and 1.414 extension levels, approximately $9.11 and $15.04, respectively. These Fibonacci levels are widely used by technical analysts to project potential price expansions following breakout moves. The setup implies a scenario where XRP, after breaking through the current barrier, could experience a rapid rally fueled by technical momentum and renewed market interest. Historical price action also supports this view, as similar breakouts in previous cycles have led to vertical moves. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Market Dynamics Strengthen the Bullish Case Beyond technicals, broader market conditions are adding fuel to the bullish narrative. Bitcoin remains strong above $117,000, institutional interest in crypto continues to rise, and Ripple‚Äôs ecosystem is expanding, particularly with the rollout of RLUSD, its stablecoin aimed at unlocking real-world utility for the XRP Ledger. On-chain metrics are also encouraging. Active wallet growth, rising transaction volumes, and increased developer activity all point toward strengthening fundamentals for XRP. This on-chain support helps validate the idea that price appreciation could be sustainable if resistance is flipped into support. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. HEADLINE: Ethereum Dips Below $3,600 After Trump Tariff Remarks, But ETH/BTC Ratio Hits Multi-Week High
SUMMARY: Ethereum faced a sharp pullback Wednesday as former President Donald Trump‚Äôs tariff comments rattled risk markets. In a press briefing, Trump said he‚Äôd only ease tariffs if foreign markets opened wider to U.S. goods‚Äîa hardline stance that sent shockwaves across global assets. Ethereum reacted fast. The price slipped below $3,600 , falling to $3,590 ‚Äîits lowest in days, according to CoinMarketCap . But beneath the surface, a deeper shift is underway. At the same time ETH/USD slid, the ETH/BTC ratio quietly hit its highest level in weeks ‚Äîclimbing above 0.031 , up from 0.022 just a month ago. That‚Äôs a 40%+ move in 30 days, underscoring Ethereum‚Äôs strength relative to Bitcoin. The Dual Drivers for Ethereum: Institutions and ETFs This relative ETH strength isn‚Äôt a fluke. Two forces are fueling it: Institutional buying : Funds and large players continue locking in Ethereum positions. ETF inflows : July has seen record weekly inflows into Ethereum-based exchange-traded funds. Assets under management are swelling, signaling surging investor appetite. Smart contract usage, DeFi traction, and staking demand all add tailwinds. Confidence is rebuilding‚Äîand the ETH/BTC ratio tells that story clearly. Since its five-year low near 0.018 in April‚Äîmatching March 2020 crash levels‚Äîthe ETH/BTC ratio has now rebounded more than 70% . Bulls point to the 0.02 level as a new long-term support floor. The ETH/BTC ratio has grown over 40% in the past month, climbing to ~0.031 from as low as ~0.022 on June 23. This gain roughly matches Ethereum‚Äôs 60%+ price rally over the last 30 days, fueled by growing institutional interest and massive #Ethereum ETF inflows in July. pic.twitter.com/WpnTXf1RoG ‚Äî CryptoRank.io (@CryptoRank_io) July 23, 2025 Altseason Rumblings Grow As Ethereum gains ground on Bitcoin, traders are beginning to whisper the ‚ÄúA‚Äù word again‚Äî altseason . Historically, when ETH outperforms BTC, smaller-cap coins tend to follow. Decentralized exchange volumes have ticked higher. Open interest in ETH perpetuals has surged. Funding rates have flipped positive on major platforms. Even with today‚Äôs dip, Ethereum‚Äôs fundamentals remain firm: Daily Transactions : 1.2M+ Staked ETH : Over 10 million Gas Usage : Spiking across DeFi protocols Macro Uncertainty Lingers Still, macro clouds haven‚Äôt cleared. With key U.S. inflation data due this week, the Federal Reserve could keep interest rates elevated. That could pressure all risk assets, crypto included. Trump‚Äôs tariff tone just added another layer of uncertainty. Some see it as noise. Others view it as a reminder: U.S. policy remains volatile‚Äîand so does the market. ETH Price : $3,590 ETH/BTC Ratio : ~0.031 (up from 0.022 on June 23) Monthly ETH Gain : 60%+ ETF Inflows : Record highs in July Ethereum‚Äôs price has wobbled‚Äîbut the broader trend still leans bullish. The rising ETH/BTC ratio signals underlying strength. Institutional buyers are still circling. ETF inflows keep building. And altcoin traders are watching closely. If the ratio breaks above 0.035 , many expect the next leg up‚Äînot just for ETH, but for the entire altcoin market. Disclosure: This is not trading or investment advice. Always do your research before buying any cryptocurrency or investing in any services. Follow us on Twitter @nulltxnews to stay updated with the latest Crypto, NFT, AI, Cybersecurity, Distributed Computing, and Metaverse news !

HEADLINE: Spot Ethereum ETFs saw $533.9 million in inflows, the 3rd largest single-day gain
SUMMARY: US spot Ethereum ETFs pulled in around $533.9 million in daily inflows, the 3rd largest single‚Äëday gain since these products began trading. The figures point to rising interest in ether from investors. Data from SoSoValue shows that BlackRock‚Äôs iShares Ethereum Trust (ETHA) led the way with $426.2 million worth of inflows. Grayscale‚Äôs Ethereum Mini Trust added $72.6 million, while Fidelity‚Äôs ether ETF brought in $35 million. The total ranks just behind the value of $726.7 million from the previous Wednesday and the $602 million seen last Thursday. Vincent Liu, chief investment officer at Kronos Research, pointed to a drop in bitcoin dominance and steady macro conditions for support of ether‚Äôs gains. ‚ÄúETH‚Äôs momentum looks set to sustain in the mid‚Äëterm as long as these factors hold,‚Äù Liu said. Nick Ruck, from LVRG Research, noted that institutions appear to be turning bullish on Ethereum. He said the record‚Äëhigh inflows into spot ether ETFs offer ‚Äúa second opportunity for investors who missed out on Bitcoin‚Äôs historic rise,‚Äù as part of their reserve strategies for digital assets. Companies are starting to add ether to their balance sheets under new treasury plans. For instance, SharpLink Gaming has already shifted the focus to building up its ether holdings after outlining its Eth treasury strategy earlier in May. By contrast, spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds saw net outflows of $67.9 million on Tuesday. The previous day, investors had pulled $131.3 million from these funds, indicating a shift away from bitcoin. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre seeing a familiar rotation from Bitcoin to Ethereum,‚Äù ‚Äì Min Jung, a research analyst at Presto. ‚ÄúBitcoin has rallied significantly this year, and for investors who feel they‚Äôve ‚Äòmissed‚Äô the BTC trade or are looking for the next opportunity, Ethereum is becoming the natural next step.‚Äù Ethereum‚Äôs recent rally comes from a surge in structural demand In a July 22 memo, Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan described what he called a ‚Äúdemand shock‚Äù for ether. He wrote that since May 15, ETFs and corporate treasuries have bought approximately 2.83 million ETH, worth about $10‚ÄØbillion. That is about 32x the number of ETH minted by the network over the same period. Hougan said that over the past month alone, ether has jumped over 65%, and since April, the price has climbed over 160%. He argued that this rise is driven by the imbalance between fresh demand and new supply, rather than changing market sentiment. Since US spot BTC ETFs began trading at the start of last year, funds on Wall Street, public companies including Trump Media and Strategy, and some governments have added over 1.5 million Bitcoins to their reserves, compared with only 300,000 newly minted coins. This roughly 5 to 1 demand advantage helped push bitcoin‚Äôs price up about 155%, making it the highest performer in this time. ‚ÄúFive times more demand than supply. Sometimes it really is that simple,‚Äù Hougan wrote. Ethereum‚Äôs early rally run did not see strong demand In the first ten months after spot ETH ETFs launched in the mid of 2024, these funds bought just 660k coins with roughly $2.5‚ÄØbillion in net new money, while public companies added only small amounts, and the network issued about 543,000 ETH. As a result, ether trailed behind bitcoin‚Äôs performance over that stretch. Then, spot ETH products ramped up their purchases in mid-May. They have since bought over $5‚ÄØbillion worth of ether, while companies such as SharpLink Gaming, Bit Digital, BitMine Immersion, and The Ether Machine, revealed large‚Äëscale treasury plans. These companies purchased around 2.83 million Ethereum, a move that likely helped the token break above $3,800. Looking ahead, Hougan forecasted that ETFs along with corporate treasuries may purchase $20 billion worth of Ethereum over 2025. That would be around 5.33 million tokens. At the same time, the network would only issue around 800,000 Ethereum in this time frame. He mentioned that investors remain underexposed to Ethereum in comparison with bitcoin but also expects that to change as stablecoin and tokenization trends grow. ‚ÄúIn the short term, the price of everything is set by supply and demand, and right now, there is more demand for ETH than supply,‚Äù Hougan wrote. ‚ÄúAs a result, I think we‚Äôre heading higher.‚Äù Cryptopolitan Academy: Coming Soon - A New Way to Earn Passive Income with DeFi in 2025. Learn More

By contrast, spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds saw net outflows of $67.9 million on Tuesday. The previous day, investors had pulled $131.3 million from these funds, indicating a shift away from bitcoin. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre seeing a familiar rotation from Bitcoin to Ethereum,‚Äù ‚Äì Min Jung, a research analyst at Presto. ‚ÄúBitcoin has rallied significantly this year, and for investors who feel they‚Äôve ‚Äòmissed‚Äô the BTC trade or are looking for the next opportunity, Ethereum is becoming the natural next step.‚Äù Ethereum‚Äôs recent rally comes from a surge in structural demand In a July 22 memo, Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan described what he called a ‚Äúdemand shock‚Äù for ether. He wrote that since May 15, ETFs and corporate treasuries have bought approximately 2.83 million ETH, worth about $10‚ÄØbillion. That is about 32x the number of ETH minted by the network over the same period. Hougan said that over the past month alone, ether has jumped over 65%, and since April, the price has climbed over 160%. He argued that this rise is driven by the imbalance between fresh demand and new supply, rather than changing market sentiment. Since US spot BTC ETFs began trading at the start of last year, funds on Wall Street, public companies including Trump Media and Strategy, and some governments have added over 1.5 million Bitcoins to their reserves, compared with only 300,000 newly minted coins. This roughly 5 to 1 demand advantage helped push bitcoin‚Äôs price up about 155%, making it the highest performer in this time. ‚ÄúFive times more demand than supply. Sometimes it really is that simple,‚Äù Hougan wrote. Ethereum‚Äôs early rally run did not see strong demand In the first ten months after spot ETH ETFs launched in the mid of 2024, these funds bought just 660k coins with roughly $2.5‚ÄØbillion in net new money, while public companies added only small amounts, and the network issued about 543,000 ETH. As a result, ether trailed behind bitcoin‚Äôs performance over that stretch. Then, spot ETH products ramped up their purchases in mid-May. They have since bought over $5‚ÄØbillion worth of ether, while companies such as SharpLink Gaming, Bit Digital, BitMine Immersion, and The Ether Machine, revealed large‚Äëscale treasury plans. These companies purchased around 2.83 million Ethereum, a move that likely helped the token break above $3,800. Looking ahead, Hougan forecasted that ETFs along with corporate treasuries may purchase $20 billion worth of Ethereum over 2025. That would be around 5.33 million tokens. At the same time, the network would only issue around 800,000 Ethereum in this time frame. He mentioned that investors remain underexposed to Ethereum in comparison with bitcoin but also expects that to change as stablecoin and tokenization trends grow. ‚ÄúIn the short term, the price of everything is set by supply and demand, and right now, there is more demand for ETH than supply,‚Äù Hougan wrote. ‚ÄúAs a result, I think we‚Äôre heading higher.‚Äù Cryptopolitan Academy: Coming Soon - A New Way to Earn Passive Income with DeFi in 2025. Learn More

HEADLINE: Big Money Enters BNB, Pushing Crypto To $801 ATH‚ÄîDetails
SUMMARY: BNB, the native cryptocurrency of BNB Chain, crossed the $800 level in early Asian trading on Wednesday to set a new all-time high of $801. Related Reading: Too Pricey? Expert Says XRP Beats Bitcoin And Ethereum Right Now The surge came after a 5% increase over the last 24 hours and a 13% gain in the last week, taking BNB‚Äôs market capitalization to over $110 billion. Currently, it ranks as the fifth-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization. Spike In Volume And Derivatives Trading Volume trading around BNB has increased strongly. According to Coinglass data, daily volume rose over 40% to over $3 billion. Derivatives volume surged 31% to $2.18 billion, while open interest in BNB futures increased 19% to $1.23 billion. These represent an expanding tide of speculation and demand for the asset, perhaps fueled by fresh money flowing into the market. A good deal of this movement seems to be riding on bullish momentum forming around BNB‚Äôs recent price action. The token has been in an uptrend for weeks now, and this breakout above its previous highs indicates buyers are remaining bullish, even as there are indications that the market is heating up. Meanwhile, the relative strength index (RSI) is also well into overbought conditions at 87.50. When the RSI crosses above 70, it generally means that a pullback may be imminent. Nevertheless, the uptrend is still in place. BNB is well above its 20-day simple moving average of $704. Price is higher with good volume, and this is a combination that is commonly used to confirm trend strength. Nano Labs Buys $90 Million Worth Of BNB Institutional buying could be propelling the rally. On July 22, China-founded Web3 infrastructure company Nano Labs Ltd announced it had added 120,000 BNB tokens to its holdings‚Äîworth around $90 million. According to the company, it bought over-the-counter at an average cost of $707 per BNB. Nano Labs stated that it views BNB as a strategic reserve asset and will continue to add to its holdings. It also stated that it will invest in companies that are dedicated to the BNB ecosystem. Such a long-term commitment brings an element of confidence for retail investors tracking the token‚Äôs movements closely. All the hype aside, there are beginning to appear some warning signs. BNB is now trading above the top Bollinger Band, an indication that the token may be getting stretched. Related Reading: Solana DeFi Rebirth: TVL Breaks Past $14 Billion Amid Price Surge Featured image from Unsplash, chart from TradingView

HEADLINE: Washington State Moves To Forfeit $7.1 Million Worth Of Crypto From International Fraud Scheme
SUMMARY: The U.S. Attorney‚Äôs Office for the Western District of Washington filed a civil action on Tuesday seeking the forfeiture of over $7 million in digital assets recovered from a massive crypto scheme, a new press release from the Department of Justice shows. Fraudsters Stole $97 Million in Crypto Scheme, New Press Release Shows According to the July 23 press release , U.S. officials are looking to forfeit $7.1 million, just a sliver of the $97 million stolen by a handful of crypto fraudsters between June 22 and July 24. U.S. commences civil action to forfeit $7.1 million in cryptocurrency tied to oil and gas storage fraud scheme ‚Äì Crypto seized from wallets tied to Russian and Nigerian IP addresses https://t.co/LoCQb0yC06 ‚Äî WDWAnews (@WDWAnews) July 22, 2025 Recovered in December 2024, the illicit funds were laundered as part of a complex oil tank rental scheme involving Newcastle, Washington resident Geoffrey K. Auyeung. ‚ÄúThe co-schemers in this fraud moved their ill-gotten gain through various cryptocurrency accounts to try to launder the money stolen from victims,‚Äù said Acting U.S. Attorney Miller. ‚ÄúFederal investigators and prosecutors in our office moved as quickly as possible to trace and seize the cryptocurrency so that some of the losses can be returned to victims.‚Äù Crypto Fraudster Faces Up to 200 Years Behind Bars Indicted in August 2024, Auyeung and his unnamed co-conspirators allegedly convinced unwitting victims to move their funds into escrow accounts based in Europe and Texas in order to generate ‚Äúsignificant profits‚Äù from renting out oil tanks there. Once victims sent their money, the crypto fraudsters stopped responding and shuffled the funds to crypto accounts in Russia and Nigeria‚Äîone of which had ties to a terrorist organization. ‚ÄúThe money was quickly moved to one or more of at least 81 different accounts at financial institutions, moved offshore, or moved to one or more of at least 19 different cryptocurrency accounts, where it was used for the purchase of cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Tether, USD Coin, and Ethereum,‚Äù the press release states. Auyeung faces a maximum of 200 years behind bars if convicted for the international crypto fraud , though sentencing varies per jurisdiction. The post Washington State Moves To Forfeit $7.1 Million Worth Of Crypto From International Fraud Scheme appeared first on Cryptonews .

HEADLINE: Interest Rate Cuts: Unlocking Crypto Market Potential in 2024?
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Interest Rate Cuts: Unlocking Crypto Market Potential in 2024? The world of cryptocurrency is always buzzing with anticipation, and few topics generate as much discussion as the potential shifts in global monetary policy. For crypto enthusiasts and investors, the whispers of impending interest rate cuts from major economies, particularly the United States, carry significant weight. Why? Because these decisions by central banks can ripple through financial markets, influencing everything from bond yields to the volatile yet exciting realm of digital assets. Understanding these macroeconomic currents is not just for economists; it is crucial for anyone looking to navigate the often-unpredictable tides of the crypto market. What Did U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent Say About Interest Rate Cuts? Recently, the financial world turned its attention to a significant statement from a prominent figure: U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent. According to the widely followed Walter Bloomberg economic news account on X (formerly Twitter), Bessent indicated that the U.S. could realistically anticipate ‚Äòone or two rate cuts‚Äô this year. This declaration, coming from such a high-ranking economic official, is far more than a casual remark; it is a powerful signal that warrants close examination by anyone invested in or considering the crypto market. Secretary Bessent‚Äôs insights are particularly relevant because he sits at the heart of U.S. economic policy. His perspective offers a glimpse into the administration‚Äôs thinking and expectations regarding the nation‚Äôs financial trajectory. When a Treasury Secretary speaks about interest rate cuts , it suggests that the underlying economic conditions‚Äîsuch as inflation trends, employment data, and overall economic growth‚Äîare being carefully evaluated, potentially paving the way for a shift in the Federal Reserve‚Äôs monetary stance. While the Federal Reserve operates independently, high-level government officials often have access to comprehensive economic data and forecasts that inform their public statements, making Bessent‚Äôs comments a key piece of the puzzle for market watchers. Why Do Interest Rate Cuts Matter for the Crypto Market? Understanding the intricate dance between traditional monetary policy and the decentralized world of cryptocurrency is crucial for any investor. Historically, there is an inverse relationship often observed: when interest rate cuts are on the horizon or enacted, riskier assets, including cryptocurrencies, tend to become more attractive. But what exactly drives this dynamic? Let‚Äôs break down the core mechanisms: Lower Borrowing Costs: When central banks reduce interest rates, the cost of borrowing money for businesses and consumers decreases. This encourages spending and investment, as capital becomes cheaper to acquire. More money flowing through the economy often finds its way into various asset classes, including those perceived as having higher growth potential. Increased Liquidity: Reduced interest rates typically lead to an expansion of the money supply and increased liquidity in the financial system. This abundance of capital seeks returns, and with lower yields on traditional ‚Äòsafe‚Äô investments like savings accounts or government bonds, investors are often pushed towards assets that promise higher growth, even if they come with greater risk. Reduced Opportunity Cost: The opportunity cost of holding riskier assets like cryptocurrencies decreases when interest rates are low. If you can earn minimal returns from a bank savings account or a low-yield bond, the allure of potentially significant gains from crypto becomes stronger, making the trade-off more appealing for investors seeking better returns. Valuation of Growth Assets: Many crypto projects, particularly those focused on innovation and future technologies, are considered ‚Äògrowth assets.‚Äô In a lower interest rate environment, the present value of future earnings or potential growth for these assets tends to increase. This is because the discount rate used to value future cash flows or potential market share is lower, making their long-term prospects appear more valuable today. These factors collectively create an environment where the perceived risk-reward balance shifts in favor of growth-oriented and volatile assets, making the prospect of interest rate cuts a generally bullish signal for the cryptocurrency market. Navigating the Economic Landscape: What are the Broader Implications of Rate Cuts? While the direct impact on crypto is a major focus for our community, it is vital to zoom out and consider the broader economic implications of interest rate cuts . These decisions are not made in a vacuum; they reflect central banks‚Äô assessment of economic health and their strategies to achieve stability and growth. A rate cut typically signals a desire to stimulate economic activity, combat potential slowdowns, or manage disinflationary pressures. The Federal Reserve, the U.S.

HEADLINE: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent Calls for ‚ÄòInternal Review‚Äô of Federal Reserve As Pressure on Jerome Powell Mounts
SUMMARY: U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent is calling for a review of the central bank‚Äôs operations as Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell faces mounting pressure to resign. In a new interview with Bloomberg Television, Bessent says that the Federal Reserve is in need of deeper scrutiny as its budget and operations have expanded over the years. Bessent‚Äôs comments come as President Donald Trump has said he hopes Powell quits and has also considered attempting to remove him, all while slamming the Fed chair for not cutting interest rates. ‚ÄúThe President has said he is not going to fire Chair Powell. I was somewhat surprised that [economist] Mohamed El-Erian came out and said that [Powell should resign]. And what I‚Äôve come out and said is that I believe that it would do Chair Powell a favor, and he would be doing the institution a favor, if he did an internal review, separate monetary policy from everything else. And this is something that [economist and former U.S. Secretary of the Treasury] Larry Summers and I agree on, is this mission creep from the Fed is endangering their independence of monetary policy, all these other things that they‚Äôre engaging in could threaten monetary policy. It is a big, sprawling institution. The central budget for the board is up 4x since 2004, and every institution needs to examine themselves.‚Äù Bessent also says he‚Äôd support Powell overseeing the agency‚Äôs review, despite the criticism he‚Äôs facing. ‚ÄúIt could be a committee. It could be a group. They could invite outside experts in. The Bank of England after the 2022 rate hike shock went back and did a very good examination of what went wrong with monetary policy that brought in outside experts. I think an internal review would be a good start. And if the internal review didn‚Äôt look like it was serious, then maybe their could be an external review.‚Äù Follow us on X , Facebook and Telegram Don''t Miss a Beat ‚Äì Subscribe to get email alerts delivered directly to your inbox Check Price Action Surf The Daily Hodl Mix Disclaimer: Opinions expressed at The Daily Hodl are not investment advice. HEADLINE: Best Crypto to Buy Now: Bitcoin Solaris Presale Offers What Bitcoin Did in 2010 ‚Äì Life-Changing Returns
SUMMARY: Everyone in crypto dreams of catching the next big wave. Bitcoin did it in 2010. Ethereum followed. Now, whispers across the space suggest Bitcoin Solaris (BTC-S) might just be the one writing the next millionaire chapter. This is not a drill. The momentum behind Bitcoin Solaris is climbing fast. Crypto insiders are watching closely. The technology, the presale, and the explosive growth potential are aligning in a way the market has not seen in years. If 2010 gave us Bitcoin‚Äôs riches, 2025 looks ready to make history again with Bitcoin Solaris. Why Bitcoin Solaris Feels Like Bitcoin in 2010 Back in 2010, Bitcoin felt like a gamble. Few could imagine it would create millionaires or reshape finance forever. Fast forward to today, and history might just be repeating itself with Bitcoin Solaris. The difference? This time, it is happening faster, with clearer tech, and with far more scalability built from the start. Bitcoin Solaris offers the kind of opportunity early Bitcoin buyers wish they could find again. This is not about waiting a decade for adoption. BTC-S is already building its infrastructure, community, and listings to hit the ground running. With mobile-first mining, blazing-fast transaction speeds, and a hybrid consensus securing the network, it is poised to deliver returns that could make 2025 feel like 2010 all over again. Key Highlights Include: 3,000 TPS on the Proof-of-Work Base Layer 100,000 TPS on the Delegated Proof-of-Stake Solaris Layer 2-second transaction finality Validator rotation every 24 hours Full audit approvals from Cyberscope and Freshcoins This is why Bitcoin Solaris is attracting attention, and this is why the presale is exploding. A Presale Gathering Massive Attention The Bitcoin Solaris presale is entering its most critical phase. With only less than 2 weeks left and phase 12 fully underway, BTC-S is priced at $12 right now. Next phase? $13. Launch price? $20. The math here is hard to ignore. That is a potential 150% return just from securing tokens early. Over $7.7M+ raised so far. Over 15,800 unique users on board. This is shaping up to be one of the fastest and most successful presales in the space. During this surge, one of the standout voices is Token Empire . In their detailed review, they highlighted how Bitcoin Solaris stands out with its dual-consensus architecture and unrivaled scalability. You can catch their full review through Token Empire here. Wallets like Trust Wallet and Metamask are recommended for seamless token delivery after launch. To receive your tokens on launch day, Bitcoin Solaris recommends using Trust Wallet or Metamask . Old Coins Are Slowing Down Bitcoin Solaris Is Just Getting Started Real Utility, Real Scalability, Real Opportunities Bitcoin Solaris is not just about numbers. Its architecture offers solutions that directly challenge the limitations of legacy chains. Mobile mining through the upcoming Solaris Nova App Fully decentralized with cross-layer validator security Seamless interaction between Proof-of-Work and Delegated Proof-of-Stake layers Use cases span industries: DeFi and synthetic assets Gaming, NFTs, and virtual economies Healthcare, education, and government integrations IoT and smart city technology Bitcoin Solaris aims to power real-world innovation while rewarding its community through mining, staking, and governance. It is designed to scale where others fail. The LBank Listing That Changes Everything Not every project secures a listing on LBank before launch. Bitcoin Solaris has already confirmed it. This is a huge milestone. LBank listings provide instant credibility, easier liquidity, and access to a wider investor base globally. For a project still in presale, this is a rare and powerful achievement. HEADLINE: Fraudster Sells Check Images Stolen From Billion-Dollar Bank‚Äôs System, Causing Lender To Lose $108,000
SUMMARY: The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC) is taking action against a former bank employee who allegedly sold check images that resulted in a six-figure loss for the lender. The OCC says it‚Äôs issuing an order of prohibition against Cricel Santamaria, a former client service representative at Webster Bank in Stamford, Connecticut. Says the OCC, ‚ÄúFrom approximately April 2019 until May 23, 2022, the respondent was employed at the bank. Between approximately October 2021 and April 2022, the respondent obtained approximately 62 check images from the bank‚Äôs internal systems and made them available for sale over the internet. Thirteen bank customers reported fraud on their accounts shortly after their checks were made available for sale on the internet. The total fraud reported was $237,374 and the total Bank loss was approximately $108,000.‚Äù According to the OCC, Santamaria ‚Äúengaged in unsafe or unsound practices, caused more than a minimal loss to the bank, demonstrated personal dishonesty and willful or continuing disregard for the safety and soundness of the bank.‚Äù The OCC order prohibits the ex-banker from working in the banking and financial services industry. Santamaria consents to the OCC order without admitting or denying any wrongdoing. Under the order, the Department of Justice (DOJ) retains its right to ‚Äúbring other actions deemed appropriate‚Äù against Santamaria. The Webster Bank, a commercial bank based in Stamford, Connecticut, has more than $70 billion in assets under management. HEADLINE: Report from Danish X Space: XRP Holders Belong in Prison
SUMMARY: A firestorm has erupted on X following a controversial statement allegedly made during a recent ‚ÄúCoffee and Danish‚Äù Space, where a speaker reportedly said that ‚ÄúXRP people should be born in prison and have to prove their way out.‚Äù The remark was highlighted in a widely shared post by parody account Guardy, stirring outrage across the XRP community and reigniting tensions between XRP supporters and Bitcoin maximalists. A Statement That Crossed the Line? The comment marks one of the more extreme examples of tribalism within the crypto space. According to Guardy‚Äôs post, which referenced the now-infamous Space, the speaker questioned the legitimacy of XRP holders and suggested they were inherently untrustworthy. On record. #XRP people belong in prison! From the Danish space. pic.twitter.com/B3MQIU4QUN ‚Äî Guardy (PARODY?) (@GLigh7) July 22, 2025 While Guardy‚Äôs account is tagged as ‚Äúparody,‚Äù the tone and phrasing sparked immediate backlash . The strong reaction from the XRP community indicates just how sensitive and deeply polarized crypto discourse has become. XRP Community Reacts Swiftly XRP enthusiasts wasted no time responding to the alleged insult. Saul, while responding, stated, ‚Äú My biggest issue is how little sense the statement makes. It‚Äôs offensively nonsensical. XRP holders should be born in prison? What? How? One only becomes an active investor much later in life‚Äù. This was widely seen as a criticism of those who refuse to acknowledge the legitimacy of other cryptocurrencies beyond Bitcoin, particularly XRP, which has long been the target of maximalist disdain. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 The response from Justin Tomlin ‚Äì Imagine being such a hater that you‚Äôre willing to throw babies in prison over a digital asset‚Ä¶SMFH ‚Äì also pointed to a deeper frustration within the XRP community: the inability to have rational, informed discussions when one side is unwilling to recognize the technological or institutional relevance of anything outside of Bitcoin. A Deeper Divide: Bitcoin Maximalists vs. XRP Supporters The controversy underscores a broader, long-standing conflict between Bitcoin maximalists, who believe Bitcoin is the only legitimate cryptocurrency, and supporters of projects like XRP, which offer faster, more energy-efficient solutions tailored for cross-border payments. Bitcoin has come under increasing scrutiny for its high energy consumption and scalability issues, while XRP‚Äôs value proposition lies in its speed, negligible transaction costs, and eco-friendly infrastructure. This has led to more institutional support for XRP, fueling resentment in corners of the Bitcoin community where decentralization purity tests remain the standard. XRP‚Äôs Meteoric Rise Adds Fuel to the Fire Since the U.S. presidential election in November 2024, XRP has surged by over 600%, bolstered by Ripple‚Äôs legal victories, the expansion of the XRP Ledger ecosystem, and increased adoption in financial corridors across Asia, the Middle East, and Latin America. As XRP gains ground, some interpret the pushback from Bitcoin maximalists as a defensive reaction to its growing credibility and influence. The uproar caused by the comment speaks volumes about the current state of crypto culture, and the divide it exposed is all too real. Parody or not, Guardy‚Äôs post tapped into an uncomfortable truth: tribalism still dominates much of the digital asset conversation. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author‚Äôs personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid‚Äôs opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. Follow us on Twitter , Facebook , Telegram , and Google News The post Report from Danish X Space: XRP Holders Belong in Prison appeared first on Times Tabloid .

HEADLINE: Ripple Won‚Äôt Dump Its XRP Escrow Holdings: Lawyer Reveals Why It‚Äôs Actually Good For Price
SUMMARY: Legal expert Bill Morgan has commented on accusations that Ripple would dump its XRP escrow holdings at some point. He explained why that won‚Äôt happen and noted how the escrow strategy is good for the altcoin‚Äôs price. Ripple‚Äôs Escrow Will Buttress XRP Price Not Deflate It In an X post , Bill Morgan noted that even the SEC recognized that Ripple‚Äôs escrow was intended to buttress the XRP price and not deflate it. He added that even the Commission considered this to be one of the factors that would give investors an expectation of profit from the crypto firm‚Äôs efforts. The legal then remarked that this is just one of the points that clearly debunks the ‚Äòdump theory‚Äô around Ripple‚Äôs escrow . His response was in reply to a crypto community member who criticized XRP holders who think that the escrow is good for their holdings. He then indicated that the crypto firm would at some point dump its holdings on these investors. Meanwhile, Bill Morgan had earlier noted how there hasn‚Äôt been a stark difference between Ripple‚Äôs escrowed funds in 2017 and now. He revealed that the crypto firm had 55 billion XRP in escrow in late 2017 while it now has 35 billion in escrow. Ripple unlocks 1 billion XRP monthly. As such, these escrowed funds should have reduced drastically since 2017. However, Ripple typically relocks a significant portion of these coins following the monthly unlocks, which explains why the crypto firm‚Äôs holdings haven‚Äôt flooded the market. Notably, the firm uses these coins for its on-demand liquidity (ODL) services. As such, the coins that are left unlocked are in demand, which also provides a boost for the XRP price. Ripple is also looking to expand its operations, which could further boost the altcoin‚Äôs adoption. Reason For the Escrow ‚ÄòDump Theory‚Äô In response to the accusations against Ripple, Bill Morgan suggested that many of these crypto community members have been simply sidelined on the recent XRP price rally . As such, he believes this is why they are trying to spread Fear, Uncertainty, and Doubt (FUD). In an X post , he asked a particular critic if they missed out on XRP when it was still trading at $0.20. Indeed, the XRP price had traded around this level in 2023 and remained stuck in the $0.50 range for most of 2024 before finally taking off in the last quarter of the year, recording a rally of over 500%. The altcoin has continued this run this year and last week rallied to a new all-time high (ATH) of $3.65. At the time of writing, the XRP price is trading at around $3.50, up in the last 24 hours, according to data from CoinMarketCap.
TAGS: Ripple|Altcoin|and Doubt|Bill Morgan|Coinmarketcap|escrow|fear|fud|ODL|On-Demand Liquidity|ripple|ripple news|Uncertainty|US SEC|XRP|XRP news|XRP price|XRPUSD|XRPUSDT

HEADLINE: Renowned Analyst Claims: ‚ÄúThe Altcoin Season Has Begun‚Äù ‚Äì Here Are His Opinions
SUMMARY: Cryptocurrency analyst Miles Deutscher claimed that the altcoin season has begun, based on data from an artificial intelligence model and a custom dashboard. In his YouTube video, Deutscher noted that, contrary to the popular altcoin season index, the current market situation signals a positive period for altcoins. According to the analyst, approximately 70% of the top 50 altcoins are outperforming Bitcoin on a monthly basis. Deutscher suggested that Bitcoin''s dominance falling below a key support level for the first time since November 2024 has led to a shift in market momentum. He noted that the primary driver behind this shift is growing positive sentiment toward Ethereum. He argued that ETH ETFs, new regulatory frameworks, and institutional interest are boosting Ethereum, providing the necessary ‚Äúfirepower‚Äù for a broader altcoin market rally. Related News: Watch Out: Jim Cramer Spoke About Bitcoin and Ethereum! Will it be Inverse Cramer Again? He also added that he studies the charts against ETH to track the performance of altcoins relative to Ethereum. Chart with daily candles showing the latest state of Bitcoin dominance. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Renowned Analyst Claims: ‚ÄúThe Altcoin Season Has Begun‚Äù ‚Äì Here Are His Opinions

HEADLINE: Bitcoin whales are being spooked to move coins with dust transactions containing threatening messages
SUMMARY: The recent price records for BTC coincided with a wave of old whales moving their coins. Some suggested this may be a drive to take profits, but there may be another reason, as more old whales are dusted with transactions containing warning messages. There may be one common reason as to why old whales are moving their coins. After years of holding, some of the largest holders transferred their coins. The most notable case was of one user moving 80,000 BTC from several wallets. The reason may be hiding behind the spread of messages, which are considered a specific scam using the op return function of Bitcoin transactions. Investigators, however, noted that many old whale wallets received dust amounts of BTC with a pseudo-legal message attached to the transaction. The targeted addresses were not specifically chosen, except by one common thread ‚Äì a high balance and old wallets from the early years of the network. Dust messages reach BTC lost in landfill One on-chain investigator noted the pseudo-legal messages reached a notorious BTC wallet. The stash belonged to James Howells, known for trashing a hard drive containing 8,000 BTC. Since the address is widely known and the coins are considered lost, the legal claim to the BTC in Howell‚Äôs wallet is meaningless. Just realized that the person who sent notices to the 80,000 BTC that moved earlier this month has also been targeting several other dormant addresses, including the one belonging to James Howells, the guy who lost his hard drive in the landfill. This pretty much puts the hack‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Sani | TimechainIndex.com (@SaniExp) July 23, 2025 This also suggests that the whale that moved 80,000 BTC may have acted out of caution, despite the fact that BTC cannot be claimed legally and used for its purpose without control over the private keys. Unfortunately, even a legal claim would not be able to salvage Howells‚Äô coins. The wallet has been pelted with messages and even an ultimatum to prove that the coins are not forfeited. The wallet of James Howells, containing 8,000 BTC, has been given a deadline to prove the coins are not abandoned. The BTC sit in an old hard drive, buried under layers of trash in a landfill. | Source: Mempool.space Howells has been given a deadline until September 30 to prove ownership. One of the messages even read ‚Äòwe have taken possession of this wallet and its contents‚Äô. Unless the sender managed to unearth the hard drive and revive the old wallet, the message remained meaningless. There is currently no explicit list of addresses that received the fake legal claims through op_return. Other old whales may also have moved their coins as a precaution or to shift them to a new address format. Newer whales that bought at a more favorable price did not receive the legal notes. Recently, three wallets linked to the same entity moved 10,606 BTC, potentially having a medium-term strategy. BTC whales have already taken profits A total of 14.7M BTC are held in wallets aged 155 days or over. Most of the older whales have moved their coins and realized profits during the earlier BTC bull rallies. Since 2023, the percentage of coins held for more than one year has been sliding slowly. Overall, ancient cohorts of over 7 years rarely move their coins. Newer whales have a double strategy of holding some of the BTC, while using a portion for short-term trading. The newest class of corporate and institutional buyers has diverging approaches to announcing their wallets. Some are showing proof of public reserves, while others try to keep their wallets a secret to avoid exposure and eventual attacks. The BTC sit in an old hard drive, buried under layers of trash in a landfill. | Source: Mempool.space Howells has been given a deadline until September 30 to prove ownership. One of the messages even read ‚Äòwe have taken possession of this wallet and its contents‚Äô. Unless the sender managed to unearth the hard drive and revive the old wallet, the message remained meaningless. There is currently no explicit list of addresses that received the fake legal claims through op_return. Other old whales may also have moved their coins as a precaution or to shift them to a new address format. Newer whales that bought at a more favorable price did not receive the legal notes. Recently, three wallets linked to the same entity moved 10,606 BTC, potentially having a medium-term strategy. BTC whales have already taken profits A total of 14.7M BTC are held in wallets aged 155 days or over. Most of the older whales have moved their coins and realized profits during the earlier BTC bull rallies. Since 2023, the percentage of coins held for more than one year has been sliding slowly. Overall, ancient cohorts of over 7 years rarely move their coins. Newer whales have a double strategy of holding some of the BTC, while using a portion for short-term trading. The newest class of corporate and institutional buyers has diverging approaches to announcing their wallets. Some are showing proof of public reserves, while others try to keep their wallets a secret to avoid exposure and eventual attacks. HEADLINE: BREAKING: Tesla Releases Earnings Report ‚Äì Did It Sell or Buy Bitcoin?
SUMMARY: Tesla Inc. (TSLA) announced its financial results for the second quarter of 2025. The company''s adjusted earnings per share (EPS) was 40 cents. This figure fell short of analysts'' expectations of 42 cents. Similarly, on the revenue front, Tesla''s quarterly revenue of $22.50 billion fell slightly short of the market expectation of $22.64 billion. The company remains firm on its plans for 2026. Tesla stated that the launch schedule for new vehicles is progressing as planned for 2026, including the initial production of a more affordable model. The more affordable model is expected to enter production in the first half of 2026. Related News: Renowned Analyst Claims: ‚ÄúThe Altcoin Season Has Begun‚Äù - Here Are His Opinions Meanwhile, Tesla''s digital assets, particularly Bitcoin, remained virtually unchanged, according to the earnings report. As of June 30, 2025, the total value of the company''s digital assets remained at $1.23 billion. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: BREAKING: Tesla Releases Earnings Report ‚Äì Did It Sell or Buy Bitcoin?

HEADLINE: Bitwise‚Äôs 10 Crypto ETF Approved but Stayed in Bizarre Move
SUMMARY: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has approved the conversion of Bitwise‚Äôs cryptocurrency index fund. However, the agency later issued a stay order halting the launch pending further internal review. Regulator Issues Second Reversal This Month A July 22 filing shows that the SEC had granted an ‚Äúaccelerated approval‚Äù for Bitwise‚Äôs proposal to convert its Bitwise 10 Crypto Index Fund (BITW) into a spot exchange-traded fund (ETF). In what Bloomberg ETF analyst Nate Geraci referred to as a ‚Äúbizarre situation,‚Äù the regulator then later put the action on hold. ‚ÄúThis letter is to notify you that, pursuant to Rule 431 of the Commission‚Äôs Rules of Practice, 17 CFR 201.431, the Commission will review the delegated action,‚Äù read the document. Notably, it marks the second time this month that the financial watchdog has intervened to block such a request. The SEC also stopped the launch of Grayscale‚Äôs mixed crypto ETF. That product had received initial approval from the Division of Trading and Markets, but was later stayed by the Commission under the same provisions. These back-to-back reversals have gotten criticism from analysts. In a Tuesday X post, Geraci insisted , ‚ÄúBoth of these should be allowed to convert/uplist ASAP.‚Äù The ETF was set to trade on NYSE Arca as a ‚ÄúTrust Unit‚Äù and includes a mix of top cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), XRP, Solana (SOL), Cardano (ADA), Chainlink (LINK), SUI, Avalanche (AVAX), Polkadot (DOT), and Litecoin (LTC). However, until the order is lifted, BITW shares will remain available only over-the-counter. Under Rule 431, the SEC can independently review any decision its staff makes under delegated authority. Once invoked, the regulator automatically suspends the decision until it determines whether to uphold, amend, or reverse it. Further, there isn‚Äôt a required timeline for this process. Bitwise currently manages approximately $5.79‚ÄØbillion in assets across its 12 crypto ETFs. The firm‚Äôs largest product is its spot Bitcoin ETF, which accounts for roughly $4.79 billion in AUM, while its Ethereum product holds an additional $431 million. Experts Weigh In Scott Johnsson, general partner at Van Buren Capital, and Bloomberg Intelligence ETF analyst James Seyffart shared their views on X regarding the SEC‚Äôs decision to stop these investment products from going live. Johnsson suggested that the agency may have approved the conversion with the knowledge that Commissioner Caroline Crenshaw, who has been critical of crypto, would later intervene, or that the timing was aligned with the deadlines of both proposals. ‚ÄúBoth explanations are the kind of funny business that shouldn‚Äôt really be happening under Atkins,‚Äù he wrote. Seyffart agreed, suggesting the SEC was probably stalling for time as it worked on finalizing its generic listing standards due by October 2025. The post Bitwise‚Äôs 10 Crypto ETF Approved but Stayed in Bizarre Move appeared first on CryptoPotato .

HEADLINE: XRP Price Prediction: XRP Sets New ATH, But Fans Are Still Furious ‚Äì How Quickly Could XRP Hit $20 From Here?
SUMMARY: Loyal supporters of XRP (XRP) are furious about the token‚Äôs slow journey to make a new all-time high after years of legal battles that made Ripple the Cinderella of the crypto world. For some, the XRP Army‚Äôs passion favors a bullish XRP price prediction . In a conversation with the crypto-focused magazine Decrypt, a handful of members of the so-called XRP Army shared their thoughts about the current state of the token and the journey they have all gone through. ‚ÄúSeven years of waiting for progress because [of] stupid left-wing politics in our way through the SEC. Do you understand?‚Äù commented MackAttackXRP, a prominent XRP fan whose X account is followed by more than 87,000 users. Meanwhile, another fan called John Squire said: ‚ÄúThe anger in the XRP community is mostly directed at the SEC, for artificially holding back the asset with a lawsuit that hurt retail investors the most.‚Äù Don‚Äôt celebrate anything until $XRP hits $1000, we wouldn‚Äôt want anyone getting upset. ‚Äî John Squire (@TheCryptoSquire) July 23, 2025 Now that a new pro-crypto administration has taken over and a new Chairman has been appointed to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), members of the XRP Army members believe that the token will play catch up to deliver the significant gains that other assets like Bitcoin (BTC) and Solana (SOL) have during this 7-year period. XRP Price Prediction: XRP Could Retreat a Bit Before Its Next Big Move Looking at XRP‚Äôs 4-hour chart, we can see that the latest rally has hit a ceiling once it got to $3.65. Selling pressure has been high at that point as early buyers probably started to take some profits off the table. The 9-day exponential moving average (EMA) seems poised to make a bearish crossover below the 21-day EMA, which favors a near-term correction. Any declines at this point may be considered a great opportunity to buy XRP at a lower price as the token‚Äôs long-term prospects are as promising as ever. Can XRP hit $20? It is definitely a possibility but not an easy feat. It would mean that the asset‚Äôs market value will rise to $1 trillion ‚Äì still not as valuable as Bitcoin but it would involve flipping Ethereum (ETH). In the meantime, the best crypto presales like Token6900 (T6900) offer significant upside potential in the short term as investors look for the most promising projects whose value could 10x in the next few months. Token6900 (T6900) is The Purest Meme Coin Out There ‚Äì Here‚Äôs Why Token6900 (T6900) leverages the success of SPX6900 (SPX) but adds a touch of 2000s nostalgia to the mix. This token is a meme coin in its purest form ‚Äì no road map, no use case, no promises. It is everything that Wall Street isn‚Äôt. T6900 is hard capped at $5 million, meaning that early buyers will be the ones to profit the most from its surge. Since its presale event kicked off a few weeks ago, it has already raised more than $1 million to follow the footsteps of its predecessor. To buy $T6900 at its discounted presale price of $0.006675, head to the Token6900 website and connect your wallet (e.g. Best Wallet ). You can either swap USDT or ETH for this token or use a bank card to invest. HEADLINE: Sleeping Bitcoins Are Waking Up and Entering Circulation: What Does This Mean? What Can We Expect?
SUMMARY: In his latest analysis of Bitcoin''s supply dynamics, cryptocurrency analyst Axel Adler noted that the market is still in the early stages of the macrocycle. According to Adler, the return of Bitcoins, which have been dormant for a long time, to circulation provides striking signals on the supply side, but the majority of investors are not in a rush to sell. Adler recalled two significant increases in supply volatility in past macrocycles: First, when Bitcoin rose to $70,000 in the spring of 2024, the percentage of coins activated within 180 days reached 20%. The second increase reached 18% in December 2024, when Bitcoin first surpassed the psychological threshold of $100,000. These movements indicated that long-dormant assets, known as ‚Äúsleeper coins,‚Äù were being mobilized and redistributed into the market. Adler noted that supply activity began to rise again after Bitcoin reached $100,000 again in June 2025, noting that this rate has shifted from negative territory to positive by 2.4% in the last 30 days. However, the fact that this increase is lower than past peaks suggests that there is still a significant ‚Äúbullish buffer‚Äù in the market and that supply pressure remains limited, according to Adler. Related News: Watch Out: Jim Cramer Spoke About Bitcoin and Ethereum! Will it be Inverse Cramer Again? Adler made the following assessment in his statement: Essentially, a significant portion of investors are not yet ready to sell. Supply only began to revive at the start of the new rally. As the price consolidates above $120,000, the 30-day active supply ratio will first rise to the 8-10% range, then rise again to 18-20%. Once these levels are reached, the final distribution phase will begin. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Sleeping Bitcoins Are Waking Up and Entering Circulation: What Does This Mean? What Can We Expect?
